name: Drift Street International
description:
Built from the ground up exclusively for the Nintendo DSi, Drift Street International is the ultimate high-speed, white-knuckle street racing experience.

Slide and boost your tuned performance car around challenging city streets across the US, UK and Japan, in high-intensity midnight races. Precise, responsive controls give you total control of your car – push yourself to the edge and own your opponents!

Features

• Designed for DSi – Experience finely balanced gameplay with thumping audio and super smooth visuals.
• Four-player local multiplayer – Take on up to three friends to see who really owns the road.
• Not just racing – Arcade checkpoint and speed trial modes keep the challenge fresh.
